text: Careful there.
Janitor, you have to help me.

I need to find the main circuit breaker so I can
cut power to the entire mall.
Easy, buddy. Nice.
Please, janitor, we have to hurry.
Well, I'm already in a hurry.
It's my wife Daisy's birthday tomorrow.

And if I don't get her some of those chocolate
bonbons she loves, I'm gonna be pulling rolling
pin splinters out of my backside.
Janitors can get married?
Listen, how could I know all this?
Your wife's name is Daisy.
It's her birthday tomorrow.
She loves chocolate bonbons.
You've been f***ing my wife!
I'll kill you, you son of a bitch!
Stop it! You've gone mad with rosacea.

Look, I know this sounds crazy, but I'm in some
kind of time loop.
Say no more. What do you need?
To get to the main circuit breaker.
Gotcha. These are the blueprints to the whole mall.
Now, how long is your loop?
Five minutes?
Gonna be tight.

We can find you a path there, but you're gonna
have to do--
The perfect five minutes.
Slow down! What are you, in a damn time loop or something?

[heavy metal version of 
"God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen" plays]

Hi, can I--
- There's no time!

Sweat-wicking new lux leggings for optimally 
reduced wind resistance.
Order for Big Stanno.
No hot chocolate this time,
unless I save my family. That will be my reward.
Can I help you?
Ten.
Nine.
Eight.
Seven.
Six.
Five.
Four.
Three.
Two.
One.
Anyone want a hit of this skin cream?
I did it.
They're gonna live.
I warned you this would happen.
The power's gonna go out, I said.
No tree makes a fool of Vic Mancuso!
I got this, I got this.
May I place my hand underneath your armpit?
